next_state: -= Kitchen =- You arrive in a kitchen. A standard kind of place. You can see a fridge. The fridge contains a fried red bell pepper, a fried green bell pepper, an orange bell pepper, a green hot pepper, a yellow bell pepper and a raw red tuna. You make out an oven. You see a table. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? On the table you can see a cookbook and a knife. You smell a lovely smell, and follow it to a counter. On the counter you can see a raw yellow potato, a raw red potato, a red apple and a tomato. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it. You make out a stove. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? There is an open frosted-glass door leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is not blocked by one. > -= Kitchen =-0/5
